scenario_text.value: Is it possible this is the enemy base?

You can see the road from high places, plenty
of rooms. Looks easy enough to live there.

Still, as a base it’s full of weak points. It
may be tall, but the view ain’t great.

Try and imagine some big brute shacking up in
a tiny little room like this!
Hmm, that’s a bit out there.

It’s fine if they’re just living there, but
it ain’t convenient for planning anything.
So that means this isn’t the enemy base?

More likely it’s a place to look for traces
than the enemy base, I figure?

(Traces, huh? We should take a close look
around, then.)

C’mon, let’s take it slow and steady. Look
for traces of the enemy...and of Falcomon.
